span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 平民的，社会下层的： belonging to the class of people of low social or economic rank
【例】 a man who rose to greatness but never forgot his plebeian past 一个仕途通达，但从未忘却自己平民出身的人
【近】 baseborn, common, humble, inferior, lowborn, lumpen, mean, prole, proletarian, unwashed, vulgar
【反】 aristocratic, genteel, gentle, highborn, highbred, lofty, noble, partrician, wellborn 上流社会的

【记】 音：破落布衣
